member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.RichEdit.Paragraph.AddToListAsync(DevExpress.Blazor.RichEdit.List,System.Int32)

summary.para: Adds the paragraph to a list.

member.param: A list to which the paragraph is added.
A list level to which the paragraph is added.
member.returns: A structure that stores an awaitable result of an asynchronous operation. The awaitable result is true if the operation ends successfully; otherwise, it is false.

summary.para: Gets the paragraph alignment.
Gets the paragraph background color.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.RichEdit.Paragraph.ChangePropertiesAsync(System.Action{DevExpress.Blazor.RichEdit.ParagraphProperties})

summary.para: Sets the paragraph’s properties.

member.param: A delegate method that configures paragraph properties.
member.returns: A structure that stores an awaitable result of an asynchronous operation. The awaitable result is true if the operation ends successfully; otherwise, it is false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.RichEdit.Paragraph.ContextualSpacing

summary.para: Gets whether the additional space (contextual spacing) between paragraphs of the same style is removed.

member.value: true if spacing between paragraphs of the same style is removed; false if spacing is added.
